Hello, I’m Zinzy Nev Geene (1987), a design researcher and queer facilitator in Amsterdam.

At present, I’m the Design + Product Manager of Leeruniek, a scale-up in education technology. I love organizing skill sets and relationships to demonstrate how caring for users is good for business.

I’m part of the leadership team of Vine & Fig, an international community for LGBTQIA+ Catholics. I facilitate gatherings, and write and speak about what it means to be a queer Catholic of color.

I appreciate brutalist and IndieWeb principles. You may connect with me via email.
